de: Charmante 3-Sterne-Residenz an der Schneefront, sonnig, mit bergischer Architektur. Die Residenz Le Critérium befindet sich im Herzen des Skigebiets Val Cenis und bietet einen atemberaubenden Blick auf die umliegenden Pisten und Berge mit einer Abfahrt auf Skiern.
en:
Chamring *** residence at the ski front, sunny, and in a typical mountain architecture style. It is located in the heart of Val Cenis ski resort and boasts of incredible views over the slopes and mountains with a ski-bed access.
Spacious, comfortable apartments, fully equipped, with solid wood furniture, flat screen TV, WIFI (extra charge in the apartments), and ethanol fireplace.
Beautiful balconies with outdoor furniture.
Covered parking included.
Heated ski locker and various services available.
Large reception room with fireplace and free WIFI access.
Shops on the ground floor (restaurant, souvenir press, sports shop, bread and pastries, mini-market).
Possibility to rent sheets, towels and baby kit.
Wifi in the apartments with supplement.
Possibility of short stays.
Our “tranquility offers”: formula with linen provided and beds made,
ski passes given on arrival; groceries delivered to the fridge, package
housework.
it: Residenza d'incanto 3 stelle di fronte alla neve, soleggiata, con l'architettura di montagna. Situato nel cuore della tenuta Val Cenis, il residence Le Critérium offre una vista mozzafiato sulle piste e sulle montagne circostanti con ski-in ski-out.
fr: Résidence de charme 3 étoiles en front de neige, ensoleillée, à l'architecture montagnarde. Située au cœur du domaine de Val Cenis, la résidence Le Critérium offre une vue imprenable sur les pistes et montagnes environnantes avec un départ skis aux pieds.
es: Encantadora residencia de 3 estrellas en primera línea de nieve, soleada, con arquitectura de montaña. Situada en el corazón de la zona de esquí de Val Cenis, la residencia Le Critérium ofrece una vista impresionante de las pistas y montañas circundantes con una salida de esquí de entrada/salida.
nl:
Charming 3-star residence on the snow front, sunny, with mountain architecture. Located in the heart of the Val Cenis domain, the Le Critérium residence offers a breathtaking view of the surrounding slopes and mountains with a ski-in ski-out departure.
Ruime, comfortabele appartementen, volledig uitgerust, met massief houten meubels, flatscreen-tv, WiFi (tegen betaling in de appartementen) en open haard op ethanol.
Mooie balkons met tuinmeubilair.
Overdekte parkeerplaats inbegrepen.
Verwarmde skilocker en diverse diensten beschikbaar.
Grote ontvangstruimte met open haard en gratis WiFi.
Winkels op de begane grond (restaurant, souvenirpers, sportwinkel, brood en gebak, minimarkt).
Mogelijkheid om lakens, handdoeken en babypakket te huren.
Wifi in de appartementen met supplement.
Mogelijkheid tot kort verblijf.
Onze "rustaanbiedingen": formule met lakens voorzien en opgemaakte bedden,
skipassen bij aankomst; boodschappen geleverd aan de koelkast, pakket
huiswerk.

hasBeenPublishedBy.schema:legalName: Apidae Tourisme Scic SA - source : Apidae Tourisme
